start.title: Congratulations on your promotion!
start.text: Congrats on your promotion to %TITLE% in the %DEPARTMENT% division! The higher ups are sure to start taking notice of you now!

start.title: You've made it
start.text: You're the Vice President of Nanotechnology at Megacorp! You're a VP. After years of fastidious boot-licking, you're in upper management. The vacation package alone makes it all worth while. After one year in the role, you're forced out because they're 'taking the company in another direction.' Seems you took a little too long to get here. But with the severance you buy an island. Enjoy retirement!
